abstract: The chief executive, James P. Gorman, and a top deal maker at the investment bank have called on BP — the energy giant that typically relies on in-house teams or small boutiques for mergers and acquisitions.
snippet: The chief executive, James P. Gorman, and a top deal maker at the investment bank have called on BP — the energy giant that typically relies on in-house teams or small boutiques for mergers and acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: James P. Gorman, chief executive of Morgan Stanley, has called on BP — the British energy giant that typically relies on in-house teams or small boutiques for its deal-making.
